sentences.english: So they were shut up unto the day of their death, living in widowhood.
sentences.chinese: 她們如同寡婦被禁，直到死的日子。

sentences.english: Is similar to the overwhelming majority thunderbolt, the network becomes the first disseminator .
sentences.chinese: 如同絕大多數突發事件，網絡成爲最先傳播者。

sentences.english: Like the shark, it contains a shoe.
sentences.chinese: 如同一頭大鯊，吞下一隻鞋。

sentences.english: Like humans, marmosets that die from the disease do so within 20 days of becoming ill.
sentences.chinese: 如同人類，絨猴患病後的20天內將會死亡。

sentences.english: Life is like a ten-speed bicycle. Most of us have gears we never use.
sentences.chinese: 人生如同變速自行車，很多檔，很多人都不曾用過。

sentences.english: That massive object acts as a gravitational lens.
sentences.chinese: 這種超級天體如同一個引力透鏡。

sentences.english: This photo to me is about dreaming, Chiao said.
sentences.chinese: 焦立中說，這張照片中的美景對他而言就如同夢境。

sentences.english: What water is to the earth is what air is to life.
sentences.chinese: 水之於地球，如同空氣之於生命。

sentences.english: It may also have a core, as the earth does.
sentences.chinese: 月球也可能如同地球一樣有一個地核。

sentences.english: This beatitude is as vast as the Bible itself.
sentences.chinese: 這個祝福，如同聖經本身一樣廣闊。

sentences.english: As a piece of a pomegranate are thy temples within thy locks.
sentences.chinese: 你的兩太陽在帕子內，如同一塊石榴。

sentences.english: You essence is as pure and perfect as an unblemished jewel .
sentences.chinese: 你的本質如同無瑕的珠寶一樣完美無缺。

sentences.english: This is when a bone is bent and breaks along only 1 side, like a young stick of wood.
sentences.chinese: 當骨頭彎曲，且就一側邊折斷，如同一根青嫩的枝條。

sentences.english: Conscience warns us as a friend before it punishes us as a judge.
sentences.chinese: 良心如同法曹施行懲罰之前，已如良友一般先行提醒。

sentences.english: But we were gentle in your midst, as a nursing mother would cherish her own children.
sentences.chinese: 只在你們中間爲人溫和，如同乳母顧惜自己的孩子。

sentences.english: He draws this schema exactly as I have represented it for you on the blackboard.
sentences.chinese: 他畫出這個基型，如同我在黑板上所繪製的。

definition: to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)
to be just like/can be compared to
to be as if.../to be rather like...
